Title: Wonder Woman 1984
Plot: In 1984, after saving the world in Wonder Woman (2017), the immortal Amazon warrior, Princess Diana of Themyscira, finds herself trying to stay under the radar, working as an archaeologist at the Smithsonian Museum. With the memory of the brave U.S. pilot, Captain Steve Trevor, etched on her mind, Diana Prince becomes embroiled in a sinister conspiracy of global proportions when a transparent, golden-yellow citrine gemstone catches the eye of the power-hungry entrepreneur, Maxwell Lord. Now, as a dear old friend from the past miraculously enters the picture, and Barbara Minerva, Diana's insecure gemologist colleague gives in to desire, suddenly, deceit, greed, and false promises catapult Maxwell into the limelight. More and more, cataclysmic events push the world to the brink, and emotionally vulnerable Diana must address a cruel dilemma. Can mighty Wonder Woman save humankind once again?
Writers: Patty Jenkins, Geoff Johns, Dave Callaham, William Moulton Marston
Stars: Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Kristen Wiig, Pedro Pascal
Companies: Atlas Entertainment, DC Comics, DC Entertainment
Tagline: A new era of wonder begins.

Similars.Title: Wonder Woman
Similars.Plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.
Similars.Stars: Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Robin Wright

Similars.Title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
Similars.Plot: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.
Similars.Stars: Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot

Similars.Title: Suicide Squad
Similars.Plot: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.
Similars.Stars: Will Smith, Jared Leto, Margot Robbie

Similars.Title: Aquaman
Similars.Plot: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.
Similars.Stars: Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe

Similars.Title: Birds of Prey
Similars.Plot: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.
Similars.Stars: Margot Robbie, Rosie Perez, Mary Elizabeth Winstead

Similars.Title: Justice League
Similars.Plot: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.
Similars.Stars: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Jason Momoa

Similars.Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Similars.FullTitle: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016)
Similars.Plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
Similars.Stars: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams

Similars.Title: Shazam!
Similars.Plot: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.
Similars.Stars: Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, Asher Angel

Similars.Title: Black Panther
Similars.Plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
Similars.Stars: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o

Similars.Title: Tenet
Similars.Plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
Similars.Stars: John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki

Similars.Title: Man of Steel
Similars.Plot: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened, when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.
Similars.Stars: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon

Similars.Title: Godzilla vs. Kong
Similars.Plot: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.
Similars.Stars: Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall
